Select @@version

Can I install this edition on Windows 7 Ultimate Service Pack 1?
Can I install this edition on Windows 7 Ultimate Service Pack 1(32-Bits)?
Can I install this edition on Windows 7 Ultimate Service Pack 1(32Bits)?

@nikhilshirgaonkar007, the answer to all three questions is, yes, yes and yes. But the only sane reason to install it on your workstation is for development purposes and than mostly the enterprise version is a total overkill, dl the express version from Microsoft for this type of use, its free...

Cheers to all!

Can someone help me on how this compare to SAS? For queries, crossing variables, analysis and model (regression, decision tree, clusters, etc...).
